input.sentences: we started our trip at this unique structure .
then we traveled to this outdoor casino .
my husband stumbled upon this telephone booth .
then he decided to smile for a personal picture .
we found this figurine in the museum too .
output.sentences: The stepping stones beneath his feet began shifting, transporting him to another world.
A world full of life, friends and music.
When he stepped through the door he was transported to an old fashioned telephone booth.
Inside the booth was his friend John, who whispered to him, "Sleep tight, my friend".
He opened the door to the booth to a world covered in a rusty twilight and a large clock the would dong loudly to wake him up.
